Continuous Integration (CI)

Testing, Coverage, and Documentation generation

The nox -s genNoxDocs command currently generates of the documentation and quality assurance reports (see the Quality Assurance Guide) for local viewing (see Documentation Guide ). To deploy these, the docs branch is configured to automatically deploy the docs branch to our Github Pages. We have circle CI automatically run the pytest tests to ensure that pull requests are only merged when there are no errors.

Todo

We may need to use the Continuous Integration with Github Actions feature for that the tests are all passing for the code passed up to the server. See: Documentation Guide for current Documentation and QA reporting processes.
